aboutUs.title: About Company
content: Fortuna Navale is a leading provider of qualified personnel for projects in construction, shipbuilding, industry and other sectors.

We specialize in providing flexible staffing solutions tailored to our clients' needs, from short-term projects with a small number of specialists to long-term contracts with teams of up to 60 people.

sections.title: Welding
content: We provide certified specialists in the following types of welding:
MIG (131), MAG (135, 136), MMA, TIG (141), Gas welding
Our welders comply with the ISO 9606-1 standard and have experience working in workshops and industrial facilities.

sections.title: Insulation
content: We offer comprehensive solutions for thermal, cryogenic, sound and acoustic insulation, including:
Processing of pipelines, tanks, vessels and industrial facilities
Application of modern materials and technologies in the oil and gas, chemical and other industries

sections.title: Installation of industrial equipment
content: Dismantling, transportation and installation of heavy equipment.
Preparation of foundations, alignment and commissioning of facilities.

sections.title: Painting and surface protection
content: Painting of large metal structures using modern materials.
Sandblasting to remove old paint and corrosion.
Application of protective coatings for durability and corrosion control.

sections.title: Professional preparation and laying of cable routes on a ship
content: Professional preparation and laying of cable routes on a ship, including design, installation and testing in accordance with international standards
